original_text: ‘You know that my father David could not build a temple for the Lord his God. This was because he had to fight battles against enemies that were all around Israel. He did that until the Lord helped him to win against all of them.
korean_text: 당신도 알거니와 내 아버지 다윗이 사방의 전쟁으로 말미암아 그의 하나님 여호와의 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축하지 못하고 여호와께서 그의 원수들을 그의 발바닥 밑에 두시기를 기다렸나이다

sentences.original_text: You know that my father David could not build a temple for the Lord his God
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지 다윗이 자기의 하나님 여호와를 위해 성전을 지을 수 없었다는 것을 너는 알고 있다

sentences.original_text: This was because he had to fight battles against enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 적들과 싸워야 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: He did that until the Lord helped him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와께서 그를 도우실 때까지 그렇게 했다

sentences.original_text: to win against all of them
